FuncDef: This command is used to configure the percentage of the policer s PIR leaky bucket's MBS (maximum burst size) that is reserved for high-priority traffic. While thembsvalue defines the policer s high-priority violate threshold, the percentage value defined is applied to thembsvalue to derive the bucket s low-priority violate threshold. See thembscommand details for information on which types of traffic is associated with each violate threshold.

ParaDef.Info: The percent-of-mbs parameter is required when specifying high-prio-only and is expressed as a percentage. Values-0 to 100. ParamDefault: Default- 10
